name: Life is like the fire, it begins with smoke, and ends in ash.
body:
### welcome to alex's blog.
Hi ~ , I am alex , a graduating student from Yangtze University , Jingzhou,HuBei.
Now, I'm learning Java and preparing to use it in my future work for something intrests me.
Coding may not change my life but it can influence the way I think —— Think differently.
In the past, I've written something on my [CSDN Blog](http://blog.csdn.net/v_vwang). 
> by the way,![Qter](http://qter-images.qter.org/homepage/logo129-66.png)is my cup of tea too.

***

### archives of this blog
* Java notes
* Python notes
* Linux Shell
* feelings
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
